text: Springdale is an unincorporated community in Cassia County in the U.S. state of Idaho. The community is along State Highway 81, east of Burley and west of Declo. The Snake River flows immediately north of Springdale. ==References== Category:Burley, Idaho micropolitan area Category:Unincorporated communities in Cassia County, Idaho Category:Unincorporated communities in Idaho
title: Springdale, Idaho
